Description: Rim sherd of Attic black-figured pottery Komast cup with turn to bowl; interior glazed black with a reserved band and one added red band just below rim; top of rim black; exterior: two incised spoked rosettes within compass-drawn circles, with red dots on ends of petals and in hearts.
Bibliographic references: Venit 1982 / Painted Pottery from the Greek Mainland found in Egypt, 640-450 BC (p. 370, no. B499)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.0363) (Phase 1)
